identity.name: AlpineFlow
principles: Speed is the primary feature: 60-90s rental time target
Density with Clarity: High information density without clutter
Keyboard First: Optimized for scanner and keyboard operation
Visual Feedback: Instant confirmation for every scan/action

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95

cards.base: bg-white border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.default: h-11 bg-white border-input focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-0

key_elements: KPI Cards (Top Row): Active Rentals, Returns Due, Revenue Today
Recent Activity Feed (Right Col): Live log of rentals/returns
Quick Actions: Big buttons for 'New Rental' and 'Return'

rental_process.left_panel: Customer Search & Profile (30% width) - Auto-focus search bar
rental_process.right_panel: Cart & Scanned Items (70% width) - Large typography for item names
rental_process.bottom_bar: Sticky Footer with Total Price & 'Complete Rental' (Enter key) button
rental_process.ux_rules: No mouse needed. Scanner input auto-adds to cart. 'Enter' confirms.

inventory.features: Status badges (Available/Rented/Maintenance), Bulk Actions, Barcode Search

universal_guidelines: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all Headings and 'Inter' for body text.
All interactive elements must have `data-testid` attributes.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; stick to solid whites and subtle grays.
Ensure high contrast for text (Slate-900 on White).
Input fields should be large (h-11 or h-12) for touch friendliness.
Use Lucide React icons for all iconography.
